name: aws-serverless-event-test-target
description: A serverless app that simply receives and logs events that it receives.
author: William Weiss <william@codification.org>

scripts.package: gulp package && aws cloudformation package --template-file ./app.template.yml --output-template-file ./.aws_config/packaged-template.yml --s3-bucket file://.aws_config/s3Bucket
